Deprecated API

  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.NodeRpcServerFactory
    rpc services are directly provided by a node's view, dialog or port.
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.RpcClient
    can be removed since we don't need a java-based RpcClient anymore once the Remote Workflow Editor becomes obsolete
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.RpcServerManager
    rpc services are directly provided by a node view, dialog or port. Only needed for the legacy remote workflow editor.
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.RpcSingleClient
    can be removed since we don't need a java-based RpcClient anymore once the Remote Workflow Editor becomes obsolete
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description

    rpc services are directly provided by a node's view, dialog or port.
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.RpcClient
    can be removed since we don't need a java-based RpcClient anymore once the Remote Workflow Editor becomes obsolete
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.RpcSingleClient
    can be removed since we don't need a java-based RpcClient anymore once the Remote Workflow Editor becomes obsolete
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.RpcServerManager
    rpc services are directly provided by a node view, dialog or port. Only needed for the legacy remote workflow editor.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow.RemoteWorkflowContext.getServerAuthToken()
    use RemoteWorkflowContext.getServerAuthenticator() instead
    org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow.WorkflowManagerUI.getNodeErrorMessages()
    Use WorkflowManagerUI.getNodeMessages(Type...) instead.
    org.knime.core.ui.wrapper.WorkflowManagerWrapper.getNodeErrorMessages()
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow.RemoteWorkflowContext(URI, String, String, String, URI, Version, Version)
    use RemoteWorkflowContext(WorkflowContextV2, URI, String, Authenticator, String, URI, Version, Version) instead
    org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow.RemoteWorkflowContext(URI, String, Authenticator, String, URI, Version, Version)
    use RemoteWorkflowContext(WorkflowContextV2, URI, String, Authenticator, String, URI, Version, Version) instead
